Project Description
nExt includes some nice extensions to make the development of your Project easier. WPF Behavoirs, WPF DataAnnotation support, ASP Typesafe actionlinks...etc..


**Some of the main Features **

Type Safe ASP.net Actions, ActionLinks or Redirects

example old redirect with string params (no rename or refactoring):

public ActionResult Index()
	{
		return RedirectToAction("About", "Home", new {name = "User"});
	}

new TypeSafe redirect with ControllerType and Expression, full renaming, and method refactoring (Add or change params..etc)

public ActionResult Index()
		{
			return this.RedirectToAction<HomeController>(controller => controller.About("User"));			
		}

HtmlHelper Extensions (use for example in a Razor cshtml View)

default:
@Html.Action("Contact", "Home")
@Html.ActionLink("Test Link", "About", "Home")

new TypeSafe with nExt

@using nExt.Web;
@(Html.Action<HomeController>(controller => controller.Contact()))
@(Html.ActionLink<HomeController>("Test Link", controller => controller.About("new link")))
